verses.name: 1 Kings 21:25
verses.text: But there was none like unto Ahab, which did sell himself to work wickedness in the sight of the Lord, whom Jezebel his wife stirred up.

verses.name: 1 Kings 21:26
verses.text: And he did very abominably in following idols, according to all things as did the Amorites, whom the Lord cast out before the children of Israel.

verses.name: 1 Kings 21:27
verses.text: And it came to pass, when Ahab heard those words, that he rent his clothes, and put sackcloth upon his flesh, and fasted, and lay in sackcloth, and went softly.

verses.name: 1 Kings 21:28
verses.text: And the word of the Lord came to Elijah the Tishbite, saying,
